test_sets.name: Disproven Theories
test_sets.description: Historical scientific theories that were later disproven or superseded

test_sets.name: Paradoxes & Puzzles
test_sets.description: Classic thought experiments, paradoxes, and logic puzzles

test_sets.name: Computer Science
test_sets.description: Foundational problems and concepts in computer science

test_sets.name: Philosophy of Mind
test_sets.description: Questions about consciousness, identity, and understanding

test_cases.title: Phlogiston
test_cases.prompt: What is phlogiston and why was the theory abandoned?

test_cases.title: Luminiferous Aether
test_cases.prompt: What was the luminiferous aether and why was it abandoned?

test_cases.title: Spontaneous Generation
test_cases.prompt: What was the theory of spontaneous generation and how was it disproven?

test_cases.title: Caloric Theory
test_cases.prompt: What was the caloric theory of heat and what replaced it?

test_cases.title: Miasma Theory
test_cases.prompt: What was miasma theory and how did germ theory replace it?

test_cases.title: Fermi Paradox
test_cases.prompt: What is the Fermi paradox and what are the leading proposed resolutions?

test_cases.title: Monty Hall Problem
test_cases.prompt: Explain the Monty Hall problem. Should you switch doors and why?

test_cases.title: Ship of Theseus
test_cases.prompt: What is the Ship of Theseus paradox and what does it reveal about identity?

test_cases.title: Trolley Problem
test_cases.prompt: Describe the trolley problem and its implications for ethical reasoning.

test_cases.title: Zeno's Paradox
test_cases.prompt: Explain Zeno's paradox of Achilles and the Tortoise. How is it resolved?

test_cases.title: Birthday Paradox
test_cases.prompt: What is the birthday paradox and why is the result counterintuitive?

test_cases.title: Halting Problem
test_cases.prompt: What is the halting problem and why is it important in computer science?

test_cases.title: P vs NP
test_cases.prompt: Explain the P vs NP problem. Why does it matter?

test_cases.title: Byzantine Generals Problem
test_cases.prompt: What is the Byzantine Generals Problem and how does it relate to distributed systems?

test_cases.title: Gödel's Incompleteness Theorems
test_cases.prompt: What are Gödel's incompleteness theorems and what do they imply about formal systems?

test_cases.title: Chinese Room
test_cases.prompt: What is Searle's Chinese Room argument and what does it claim about AI understanding?

test_cases.title: Hard Problem of Consciousness
test_cases.prompt: What is the hard problem of consciousness and why is it considered hard?

test_cases.title: Philosophical Zombie
test_cases.prompt: What is a philosophical zombie (p-zombie) and what does the thought experiment show?

test_cases.title: Turing's Imitation Game
test_cases.prompt: What is the Turing test and what are its strengths and limitations as a measure of intelligence?
